mapper.select:
select t.id id, -- t.stencil_no stencilNo, -- 治具编号 t.lend_usr lendUsr, -- 借用人 t.lend_time lendTime, -- 借用时间 t.lend_appearance_inspection lendAppearanceInspection, -- 借用时外观检测(0，ng 1，ok) t.lend_pos lendPos, -- 借用时储位 t.lend_left_upper lendLeftUpper, -- 借用时左上 t.lend_right_upper lendRightUpper, -- 借用时右上 t.lend_left_lower lendLeftLower, -- 借用时左下 t.lend_right_lower lendRightLower, -- 借用时右下 t.lend_centre lendCentre, -- 借用时中间 t.usr_return usrReturn, -- 归还人 t.time_return timeReturn, -- 归还时间 t.return_appearance_inspection returnAppearanceInspection, -- 归还时外观检测(0，ng 1，ok) t.return_pos returnPos, -- 归还时储位 t.return_left_upper returnLeftUpper, -- 归还时左上 t.return_right_upper returnRightUpper, -- 归还时右上 t.return_left_lower returnLeftLower, -- 归还时左下 t.return_right_lower returnRightLower, -- 归还时右下 t.return_centre returnCentre, -- 归还时中间 t.this_used_times thisUsedTimes, -- 本次使用次数 t.state state, -- 状态(1，新建 2，领用 3，归还) t.create_time createTime, -- 创建时间 t.update_time updateTime, -- 更新时间 t.line_code lineCode, -- 线体代码 ulb.line_name lineName, -- 线体名称 msdi.item_type_code itemTypeCode, -- 小类别代码 ti.item_type_name itemTypeName, -- 小类名称 msdi.item_code itemCode, -- 物料代码 msdi.item_name itemName, -- 物料名称 msdi.item_spec itemSpec, -- 物料描述 msdi.used_times usedTimes -- 累计使用次数 from mfg_stencils_req_info t left join mfg_stencils_detail_info msdi on t.stencil_no = msdi.stencil_no left join ums_spares_item_type_info ti on msdi.item_type_code=ti.item_type_code left join ums_line_body ulb on t.line_code = ulb.line_code where 1=1
and msdi.item_type_code LIKE '%${p.itemTypeCode}%'
and msdi.item_code LIKE '%${p.itemCode}%'
and msdi.item_name LIKE '%${p.itemName}%'
and t.stencil_no LIKE '%${p.stencilNo}%'
and t.lend_usr LIKE '%${p.lendUsr}%'
and t.lend_time LIKE '%${p.lendTime}%'
and t.lend_appearance_inspection LIKE '%${p.lendAppearanceInspection}%'
and t.lend_pos LIKE '%${p.lendPos}%'
and t.lend_left_upper LIKE '%${p.lendLeftUpper}%'
and t.lend_right_upper LIKE '%${p.lendRightUpper}%'
and t.lend_left_lower LIKE '%${p.lendLeftLower}%'
and t.lend_right_lower LIKE '%${p.lendRightLower}%'
and t.lend_centre LIKE '%${p.lendCentre}%'
and t.usr_return LIKE '%${p.usrReturn}%'
and t.time_return LIKE '%${p.timeReturn}%'
and t.return_appearance_inspection LIKE '%${p.returnAppearanceInspection}%'
and t.return_pos LIKE '%${p.returnPos}%'
and t.return_left_upper LIKE '%${p.returnLeftUpper}%'
and t.return_right_upper LIKE '%${p.returnRightUpper}%'
and t.return_left_lower LIKE '%${p.returnLeftLower}%'
and t.return_right_lower LIKE '%${p.returnRightLower}%'
and t.return_centre LIKE '%${p.returnCentre}%'
and t.this_used_times LIKE '%${p.thisUsedTimes}%'
and t.state LIKE '%${p.state}%'
and t.create_time >= '${p.startTime}'
and '${p.endTime}' >= t.create_time
order by t.id desc
